characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per game, a Grot Oiler can assist its master in making repairs.  When it does so, the Vehicle the Mek is repairing regains one additional wound.  When rolling to wound this unit, always use the Mek's Toughness (While it is on the battlefield).  The death of a Grot Oiler is ignored for the purposes of morale.  the Grot Oiler is considered to have the CHARACTER keyword for the purposes of shooting attacks.
